Project Object

A Project is a folder of related recordings and edits, meant to group the assets of a piece of content (i.e. an episode).

Projects will be introduced to the Riverside dashboard interface in late summer, after advanced communication to all accounts. The release of Projects wonâ€™t affect other API endpoints.

id Unique identifier for the project.

name Name of the project.

created_date Date when the project was created.

num_recordings Count of recordings associated with the project.
